snippet: “William Trost Richards: Visions of Land and Sea,” at the National Academy Museum, reclaims an American Pre-Raphaelite whose paintings were almost photorealistic in their detail.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews painting exhibit William Trost Richards: Visions of Land and Sea at National Academy Museum.
lead_paragraph: “William Trost Richards: Visions of Land and Sea,” at the National Academy Museum, reclaims an American Pre-Raphaelite whose paintings were almost photorealistic in their detail.
